translations: n.[药] 庆大霉素；艮他霉素

phrs.translation: 庆大霉素, 艮他霉素, 庆大霉毒, 抗生素
硫酸庆大霉素, 硫酸庆大小诺霉素, 庆大霉素硫酸盐, 硫酸双生霉素
硫酸庆大霉素, 庆大霉素硫酸盐
抗庆大霉素抗体, 庆大霉素抗体, 兔庆大霉素抗体, 兔抗庆大霉素抗体

sentences.sentence: Objective To observe the clinical curative effect of gentamicin-PMMA bead chains in bone and joint infections.
sentences.translation: 目的观察庆大霉素PMMA珠链治疗骨和关节感染的临床疗效。

sentences.sentence: Conclusion Gentamicin-PMMA bead chain is an important method in the treatment and prevention of bone and joint infections.
sentences.translation: 结论庆大霉素珠链是治疗及预防骨和关节感染的重要方法。

sentences.sentence: Further research into gentamicin and chloramphenicol toxicity and into the pharmacokinetics of ceftriaxone and ciprofloxacin is also required.
sentences.translation: 还需要对庆大霉素和氯霉素的毒性以及头孢曲松和环丙沙星的药物动力学做进一步的研究。
